caller_intent: Tom needed confirmation that his Toyota insurance policy was effective on the 14th to provide proof to the dealership, after initially receiving a binder with an incorrect effective date.
resolution_steps: JC informed Tom that the initial binder was processed and emailed.
Tom requested verification of the policy date for the Toyota.
JC realized the initial email contained a policy effective on the 15th instead of the requested 14th.
JC corrected the error by sending a new binder with the effective date adjusted to the 14th.
JC confirmed the corrected binder would show coverage effective for the Toyota on the 14th.
knowledge_required: Understanding of insurance binder processing and effective dates
Ability to adjust policy dates based on customer requests
Knowledge of dealership requirements for proof of insurance
systems_referenced: Email communication system for sending binders
Internal policy processing system for adjusting effective dates
summary: JC from Lions Insurance corrected an error in Tom's Toyota insurance binder, ensuring the policy was effective on the 14th as requested. After initially sending a binder with the wrong date, JC resubmitted the correct document, resolving the issue and satisfying Tom's need for proof of insurance.
